scripts.dev: concurrently "./node_modules/.bin/nodemon -x 'node --inspect=0.0.0.0:9229 $(which node-red) --settings ./dev/settings.js' -e js,html -w ./node-red-contrib-lyteworx-cluster" "./node_modules/.bin/nodemon --exec npm run rollup -w ./server -w ./client -e js,css,html,cjs,mjs"  "./node_modules/.bin/nodemon --exec cp client/* node-red-contrib-lyteworx-cluster -w ./client "
scripts.install: git submodule init && git submodule update
